ValidationRule.description: US-0018736 [AU] New Project Process/Fields for ebay AU SMB and ebay AU Enterprise US-0007032 [AU] Conditional Mandatory validations for "eBay User Id" new text field in Object "Project"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF( AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eBayAUSMB', OR(ISPICKVAL(EBH_Stage__c, 'Store Launched'),ISPICKVAL(EBH_Stage__c, 'Live to Site')),OR( ISBLANK(OracleID__c),ISBLANK(EBH_Seller__c),ISBLANK(Listings__c),ISBLANK(LegalName__c),ISBLANK(ABNVATNumber__c) ) )
,true ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields are mandatory : Seller, Oracle ID, Listings, Legal Name , ABN Number
